MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG2 area of Dumfries. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs to our underground electricity network after third party damage, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:15pm on Sunday, 28 February 2021
